price: 55. Tokkel isin Yallak kalah Yallitte takkaleeniih taqbudcn Yallittee kee sin uma malah yoh malisaay tu yok kaltaanam duddeenik tu yok kalaay inti Ramacca haanah gide yok mawadirroysinaay, yoh ma qambaalina keenik iyye.
arabic: مِن دُونِهِۦۖ فَكِيدُونِي جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ لَا تُنظِرُونِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: min dūnihi fakīdūnī jamīʿan thumma lā tunẓirūni
